short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code for any URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension for URL to  QR Code
「一鍵快速生成QR碼」擴充功能，將繁瑣的網址轉換過程簡化至單一點擊。無論是分享網頁給同事，或是為您的商業印刷品創建QR碼，這款插件都能輕鬆滿足您的需求，您只需要按照以下步驟操作即可：
1.點擊瀏覽器工具列上的擴充功能圖示。
2..在彈出視窗中輸入網址或直接使用當前頁面的網址。
3.點擊「Generate QR」以生成QR Code
4.點擊「Copy QR」複製以直接使用QR Code
為您的網路生活帶來便利，立即加入「一鍵快速生成QR碼」的用戶行列吧！

The "One-Click QR Code Generator" extension simplifies the cumbersome URL conversion process to a single click. Whether you are sharing a webpage with colleagues or creating QR codes for your business print materials, this plugin can easily meet your needs. Just follow these steps to operate:

Click on the extension icon on the browser toolbar.
Enter the URL in the popup window or use the current page's URL directly.
Click "Generate QR" to generate a QR Code.
Click "Copy QR" to copy and use the QR Code directly.
Bring convenience to your online life, join the "One-Click QR Code Generator" user ranks now!
